# Known infinite sequences with balanced decks
This is a complete list of known infinite games in balanced decks (same number of red and black cards) from 1 red card, 1 black card, to 22 cards of each. I've also included known infinte games for more cards but these aren't complete.
```
6 - 21 games:
000101  111001
